fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Enlargement, Energy, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, External Relations, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: DPC assesses EU policies in relation to its mission, particularly in terms of enlargement, where the EU has the most leverage.  DPC has paid particular attention to EU policies in the Western Balkans, but is also following the Eastern Neighborhood - Ukraine in particular. Recently DPC has started to deal with more General issues of EU foreign and security policy and the EU's policy on refugees, asylum seekers and migrants.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: DPC is a global initiative for accountability in democracy promotion.  The institutional aim is to inform the public about the impact of the policies of democracies on efforts to establish or consolidate democratic process worldwide.
relevant_communication: DPC publishes regular policy briefs, studies, reports and articles pursuant to its mission of informing the policies of the democratic world's governments, including the EU and its member states.
